squarepad.title: Transform your product images to square format
squarepad.subtitle: Generate square images from catalog, URL, or XML feed and share them with your team in seconds.

xml.label: XML Feed
xml.description: Update your XML feed with square images

image.label: Image URL
image.description: Convert any image URL to square format

product.label: Product Catalog
product.description: Create square images by selecting products from catalog

imageUrl.label: Image URL
imageUrl.hint: You can directly use image links from CDN or product pages.
imageUrl.validationError: Please enter the image URL to convert.

xml.label: Source XML URL
xml.description: The feed will be updated with square images and a shareable link with the same parameters will be generated.
xml.validationError: Please enter the source XML URL.
xml.tooltip: Enter the address of the product feed to be updated with square images.
xml.infoText: XML conversion is designed to transform XML generated by ikas's Product Exporter app. It replaces the image links with their 1:1 formatted versions, creating a new xml link.

size.label: Output Size (px)
size.tooltip: Determines the width and height of the square image in pixels.
size.tooltipXml: Set the pixel dimensions of square images.

align.label: Alignment
align.tooltip: How should the image be aligned within the square area?

format.label: Format
format.tooltip: Select the output file type. Auto option produces the appropriate format based on the browser.

background.label: Background Color
background.tooltip: Enter the color of the area outside the image in hex format.

product.selectTooltip: Open the product selection window to browse products and their images in the catalog.
product.hint: You can search by product name, ID or SKU; manage the images of your selected product within the confirmation window.
product.noProductSelected: After selecting a product and image, you can fill in the other fields of the form and create the square image.

productDialog.title: Select Product and Image
productDialog.description: Select a product from your catalog, review its images and determine which one will be used for square format.
productDialog.searchPlaceholder: Search by product name, ID or SKU
productDialog.noProducts: No products found matching your search.
productDialog.selectImage: Select the image you want to use:
productDialog.noImages: No images found for this product.

preview.title: Preview
preview.description: Review the generated square image and download it in your preferred format.
preview.descriptionImage: Review the square version of the selected image.
preview.descriptionXml: Review the relevant sections of the XML output.
preview.shareDescription: You can share the URL with your e-commerce teams or add it to your campaign tools.
preview.shareDescriptionShort: Share the URL or add it to your automations.
preview.shareDescriptionXml: Share this URL to serve the feed updated with square images.

xml.title: Update your XML feed with square images
xml.description: Enter the source XML, set square image parameters and download the updated output.

image.description: Enter any image URL, set alignment and background preferences.

product.description: Search products, review their images and select the image you want to convert to square format.
